title: Relief Fragment with Guilloche
description:
Small limestone fragment of a scroll cornice. Scroll in raised relief with extensive remains of paint.

Condition: Surface weathered and chipped. Scroll retains extensive portions of yellow paint against red background. Portions of the enclosing border retain red, yellow and blue paint. Workmanship good.
credit_line: Gift of the Egypt Exploration Society
section: The Apex of the Middle Kingdom

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
